about_the_game:
The game over screen has always been a mystery: what hides behind it?
It might surprise you that behind it lies the goddess of life, who, by making just an exception, brings the hero back to life to enable him to resume his arduous path to victory.

But- what if the hero of the story and the goddess of life don't get along well?



The Respawn Banter is a unique adventure and visual novel hybrid where you are bound to die during your exploration. In the afterlife, the goddess of life’s role extends beyond mere revival: she seizes every opportunity to humor the hero’s demise, making each encounter a one-of-a-kind witty exchange.



Game Features:
  • Dying is never the punchline: it’s the start of the joke! Experience countless dynamic discussions based on how you reach a game over! "Am I dreaming?" "Was the prophet a fraud?" "Can slimes really get drunk?": with all the heated discussions that will ensue, you'll forget that you’re actually dead!
  • Lots of carefully crafted dialogues!
  • Play as the hero of the prophecy, or at least, fail to identify with him since he’s not the classic silent protagonist. Actually, he's a dummy who never shuts up when he should and quite frankly sucks at not dying.
  • Explore and avoid unfairly funny traps. Be ready to die, but always with a smile on your face!
  • Get to know the cast of characters you will meet over the course of your multiple lives!
  • Multiple secondary endings, depending on which areas you want the poor hero to meet his demise.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / GPU compatible with OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / GPU compatible with OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Have you ever wondered what happens behind the Game Over screen? Who brings the hero of the game back to life? And why does the goddess of life always have to be so moody? Experience a witty adventure with an unique sense of humor where dying has never been so funny!
